data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

If you face your right and face forward, you will always face the forward direction. If you always face your left and face forward, you will always face the left direction. Take 3 steps. Take 3 steps right. Take 3 steps backward. So, the answer is Yes.
